response.overview: Ever wonder who the Isabel Bader Theatre was named for? Here is the answer. Isabel and Dr. Alfred Baderâ€™s love began with a chance meeting aboard a ship from Quebec to London. Despite insurmountable odds and complicated circumstances, their relationship spanned several decades. This remarkable and moving story stretches across religious lines and divisions, and is told with assuredness and style by veteran British documentarian Sue Read.
response.title: A Canadian in Love
